category.name: Workflow
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: WRKFLW_error_on_invalid_dynamic_participant
preference.preference_description: Decides whether the workflow handlers will report an error if a dynamic participant is empty or reassign task to resource pool in case of inactive user. The following handlers would use this preference: * EPM-auto-assign * EPM-auto-assign-rest * EPM-assign-team-selector * EPM-adhoc-signoffs * EPM-fill-in-reviewers * EPM-assign-signoff-dynamic-participant * EPM-assign-responsible-party-dynamic-participant Valid Values: * true: The handlers will report an error in case of empty dynamic participant or reassigns the task to resource pool in case of inactive user. * false: The handlers will not report an error in case of empty dynamic participant or reassigns task to resource pool. This is the default value.
